text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: I am hopeless to stop my "love" for racing coursing through me.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: The only cure for this persistent condition are the winds and passion on the turf……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: You do understand what I'm trying to say? —— Please arrange for a joint training run.
